tasks.title: Project Setup and Database Foundation
tasks.description: Initialize Next.js 14+ project with TypeScript, configure tooling, and establish SQLite database with core schema
tasks.details:
1. Initialize Next.js 14+ with TypeScript and App Router: `npx create-next-app@latest puffin --typescript --tailwind --eslint --app`
2. Install dependencies: `npm install better-sqlite3 @types/better-sqlite3 bcrypt @types/bcrypt tailwindcss @tailwindcss/forms`
3. Configure shadcn/ui: `npx shadcn-ui@latest init`
4. Set up Vitest: `npm install -D vitest @vitejs/plugin-react jsdom`
5. Create database schema with tables: LocalUser, Transaction, UpperCategory, SubCategory, Budget, AutoCategoryRule, SyncLog
6. Implement database initialization script with default upper categories (Income, Expense, Saving, Bill, Debt, Transfer)
7. Create lib/database.ts with connection utilities and backup functions
8. Set up project structure: app/, components/, lib/, types/
9. Configure environment variables for database path
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for database connection, schema creation, and seeding. Verify all tables created correctly with proper foreign key constraints. Test database backup/restore functionality.

subtasks.title: Next.js Project Initialization and Dependency Setup
subtasks.description: Initialize Next.js 14+ project with TypeScript, install all required dependencies, and configure essential tooling including shadcn/ui and Vitest
subtasks.details: Create new Next.js project using `npx create-next-app@latest puffin --typescript --tailwind --eslint --app`. Install core dependencies: better-sqlite3, bcrypt, tailwindcss packages. Configure shadcn/ui with `npx shadcn-ui@latest init`. Set up Vitest testing framework with React and jsdom support. Verify all packages install correctly and project builds without errors.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify project builds successfully, all dependencies resolve correctly, and basic Next.js routing works. Test that shadcn/ui components can be imported and Vitest can run basic tests.

subtasks.title: Database Schema Design and Table Creation
subtasks.description: Design and implement SQLite database schema with all core tables including proper relationships and constraints
subtasks.details: Create comprehensive database schema with tables: LocalUser, Transaction, UpperCategory, SubCategory, Budget, AutoCategoryRule, SyncLog. Define proper foreign key relationships, indexes, and constraints. Implement database initialization script that creates all tables and seeds default upper categories (Income, Expense, Saving, Bill, Debt, Transfer). Ensure schema supports soft deletes, UUIDs, and proper data types.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test database schema creation, verify all tables exist with correct columns and constraints. Test foreign key relationships work properly. Verify default data seeding creates expected upper categories.

subtasks.title: Database Utilities and Connection Management
subtasks.description: Implement database connection utilities, backup functions, and core database operations in lib/database.ts
subtasks.details: Create lib/database.ts with SQLite connection management using better-sqlite3. Implement database initialization functions, backup/restore utilities, and connection pooling. Add error handling for database operations and transaction management. Create utility functions for common database operations like migrations and health checks.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test database connection establishment, backup/restore functionality, and error handling. Verify connection pooling works correctly and database operations are properly transactional. Test migration utilities if implemented.

subtasks.title: Project Structure and Environment Configuration
subtasks.description: Set up complete project directory structure and configure environment variables for database and application settings
subtasks.details: Create organized project structure with app/, components/, lib/, types/ directories. Set up environment variable configuration for database path, authentication secrets, and other application settings. Create .env.example file with all required variables. Set up TypeScript path aliases and configure project-wide constants. Ensure proper gitignore and project documentation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify all directories are created with proper structure. Test environment variable loading works correctly. Ensure TypeScript compilation works with path aliases and all project files are properly organized and accessible.

tasks.title: Local Authentication System
tasks.description: Implement bcrypt-based local password authentication with session management
tasks.details:
1. Create LocalUser model with password_hash field using bcrypt
2. Build login page with password input form
3. Implement password setup flow for first-time users
4. Create API routes: POST /api/auth/login, POST /api/auth/setup, POST /api/auth/logout
5. Set up session management using HTTP-only cookies with iron-session or similar
6. Create middleware to protect routes requiring authentication
7. Hash passwords with bcrypt.hash() with salt rounds of 12
8. Implement session validation and automatic logout
9. Create auth context for managing login state
tasks.testStrategy: Test password hashing/verification, session creation/validation, protected route access, and first-time setup flow. Verify sessions persist across browser refreshes and expire appropriately.

subtasks.title: User Model and Password Hashing Implementation

subtasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for password hashing/verification, database model validation, and bcrypt salt rounds verification

subtasks.title: Login and Setup UI Components
subtasks.description: Build responsive login page and first-time user password setup interface components
subtasks.details: Create login form with password input validation, implement first-time setup flow UI with password confirmation, add form validation and error handling, integrate with shadcn/ui components for consistent styling, and implement loading states during authentication.
subtasks.testStrategy: Component testing for form validation, UI state management, and accessibility compliance

subtasks.title: Authentication API Routes
subtasks.description: Implement secure API endpoints for login, logout, and password setup operations
subtasks.details: Create POST /api/auth/login endpoint with bcrypt verification, implement POST /api/auth/setup for first-time password creation, build POST /api/auth/logout for session termination, add input validation with Zod schemas, and implement proper error handling with security considerations.

subtasks.title: Session Management and Middleware

tasks.title: Transaction Import System with CSV Processing
tasks.description: Build CSV import functionality with column mapping, preview, and duplicate detection
tasks.details:
1. Create CSV parser using built-in Node.js capabilities or papaparse library
2. Build file upload component with drag-and-drop support
3. Implement column mapping interface with dropdowns for Date, Description, Amount, Ignore
4. Create preview table showing parsed data with row selection checkboxes
5. Add date format detection and parsing (DD/MM/YYYY, YYYY-MM-DD, MM/DD/YYYY)
6. Implement duplicate detection algorithm (exact match: date + amount + description)
7. Create import confirmation flow with duplicate warnings
8. Build API route POST /api/transactions/import with file processing
9. Add validation for required fields and amount format
10. Handle encoding issues and malformed CSV gracefully
tasks.testStrategy: Test various CSV formats, date formats, duplicate detection accuracy, column mapping functionality, and error handling for malformed files. Verify import preview matches actual import results.

subtasks.title: CSV Parsing and File Upload Components
subtasks.description: Create CSV parser using papaparse library and build file upload component with drag-and-drop support
subtasks.details: Implement CSV parser using papaparse library for robust parsing. Build file upload component with drag-and-drop interface, file type validation (CSV only), and file size limits. Handle encoding detection (UTF-8, ISO-8859-1) and provide user feedback during upload process.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test various CSV formats, encoding types, file sizes, and drag-and-drop functionality. Verify error handling for non-CSV files and oversized files.

subtasks.title: Column Mapping Interface
subtasks.description: Build interactive column mapping interface with dropdowns for Date, Description, Amount, and Ignore options
subtasks.details: Create column mapping component with dropdown selectors for each CSV column. Support mapping to Date, Description, Amount, or Ignore fields. Include auto-detection based on column headers and data patterns. Provide visual feedback for required field mappings and validation warnings.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test auto-detection accuracy, manual mapping changes, validation for required fields, and edge cases with unusual column headers.

subtasks.title: Data Preview and Validation
subtasks.description: Create preview table showing parsed data with row selection checkboxes and field validation
subtasks.details: Build preview table component displaying parsed CSV data with mapped columns. Include row selection checkboxes for selective import. Implement field validation for amount format, required fields, and data consistency. Show validation errors inline with clear messaging.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test preview accuracy, row selection functionality, validation error display, and handling of malformed data rows.

subtasks.title: Date Format Detection and Parsing
subtasks.description: Implement automatic date format detection and parsing for multiple formats including DD/MM/YYYY, YYYY-MM-DD, MM/DD/YYYY
subtasks.details: Create date format detection algorithm that analyzes date patterns in CSV data. Support common formats: DD/MM/YYYY, YYYY-MM-DD, MM/DD/YYYY, and variations with different separators. Implement robust date parsing with fallback options and user confirmation for ambiguous dates.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test date format detection accuracy across various formats, ambiguous date handling, and parsing edge cases like leap years and invalid dates.

subtasks.title: Duplicate Detection Algorithm
subtasks.description: Implement duplicate detection algorithm using exact match on date, amount, and description fields
subtasks.details: Create duplicate detection system that compares incoming transactions against existing database records. Use exact match algorithm on date + amount + description combination. Provide duplicate resolution options: skip, replace, or import as new. Include fuzzy matching for near-duplicates with user confirmation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test duplicate detection accuracy, false positive/negative rates, fuzzy matching effectiveness, and user resolution workflow.

subtasks.title: Import Processing and API Integration
subtasks.description: Build API route POST /api/transactions/import with file processing and database integration
subtasks.details: Create API endpoint for transaction import processing. Handle file upload, CSV parsing, validation, and database insertion. Implement batch processing for large files with progress tracking. Include transaction rollback on errors and comprehensive logging for debugging.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test API endpoint with various file sizes, concurrent uploads, error scenarios, and database transaction integrity. Verify progress tracking accuracy.

subtasks.title: Error Handling and User Feedback
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive error handling and user feedback system for all import scenarios
subtasks.details: Create robust error handling for malformed CSV files, encoding issues, validation failures, and API errors. Implement user-friendly error messages, progress indicators, and success confirmations. Include detailed import summary with counts of successful, skipped, and failed transactions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test error handling for various failure scenarios, user message clarity, progress indicator accuracy, and import summary correctness.

subtasks.title: Transaction List Component with Sorting and Filtering
subtasks.description: Build the main transaction list component with sortable columns and basic filtering capabilities
subtasks.details: Create a responsive table component with sortable columns for date, description, amount, and category. Implement column sorting with visual indicators (ascending/descending arrows). Add basic filtering controls for date ranges and transaction types. Include pagination or virtual scrolling for performance with large datasets. Use React.memo and useMemo for optimization.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test sorting functionality on all columns, verify pagination performance with 10k+ transactions, test responsive behavior on mobile devices

subtasks.title: Manual Entry Form with Validation

subtasks.details: Build form with date picker, description input, amount input (with currency formatting), category dropdown, and notes field. Implement client-side validation for required fields, amount format, and date constraints. Add form state management with error handling and success feedback. Include keyboard shortcuts for quick entry and auto-focus management.

subtasks.title: Inline Editing and Categorization Interface
subtasks.description: Implement inline editing capabilities and category assignment interface for transactions
subtasks.details: Create inline editing for transaction fields with click-to-edit functionality. Build category dropdown component grouped by upper categories with search capability. Implement uncategorised inbox view filtering transactions where sub_category_id is null. Add real-time category assignment with optimistic updates and rollback on failure. Include transaction count badges in navigation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test inline editing saves correctly, category dropdown search functionality, uncategorised filter accuracy, and real-time count updates

subtasks.title: Search and Filtering Functionality
subtasks.description: Build comprehensive search and filtering system for transaction discovery
subtasks.details: Implement full-text search across transaction descriptions and notes. Create advanced filtering options for date ranges, amount ranges, categories, and custom criteria. Add filter persistence in URL parameters and local storage. Include saved filter presets and quick filter buttons. Optimize search performance with debouncing and indexing strategies.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test search accuracy across different fields, filter combinations, performance with large datasets, and filter persistence across page reloads

subtasks.title: Bulk Operations and Transaction Management
subtasks.description: Implement bulk selection and operations for efficient transaction management
subtasks.details: Add checkbox selection for individual and bulk transaction selection. Create bulk operations toolbar with delete, categorize, and export actions. Implement transaction deletion with confirmation modal and undo functionality. Build transaction detail view/modal for comprehensive editing. Add keyboard shortcuts for bulk operations and include progress indicators for long-running operations.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test bulk selection performance, confirmation modals, undo functionality, and keyboard shortcuts. Verify bulk operations complete successfully with proper error handling

subtasks.title: Monthly Budget Transaction List Integration
subtasks.description: Display a transaction list below the monthly budget view, filtered by the selected month
subtasks.details: Create a reusable transaction list component that can be embedded in the Monthly Budget view. The list should automatically filter transactions to the currently selected month based on the budget view's month navigation. Include all transaction management features (sorting, inline category editing, add transaction button, edit/delete actions) except CSV import. The transaction list should always be visible below the budget summary cards. Use the existing CategoryProvider context for efficient category data sharing.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test that transactions are correctly filtered by the selected month. Verify month navigation updates the transaction list. Test all transaction operations work correctly within the budget view context.

subtasks.title: Category Click-to-Filter in Budget View
subtasks.description: Enable clicking on a category row in the budget summary to filter the transaction list to that category
subtasks.details: Add click handlers to category rows in the budget summary section. When a category is clicked, filter the transaction list below to show only transactions in that category (while maintaining the month filter). Add visual indication of the active category filter with a clear/reset button. Implement smooth scroll to the transaction list when a category is selected. Allow clicking the same category again or a reset button to clear the category filter and show all month transactions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test category click filtering shows correct transactions. Verify clear filter functionality. Test that month filter is maintained when category filter is applied or removed.

subtasks.title: Real-time Budget Summary Updates
subtasks.description: Update the budget summary in real-time when transaction categories are changed in the list below
subtasks.details: When a user changes a transaction's category using the inline category selector in the Monthly Budget view, the budget summary cards above should update in real-time to reflect the new categorization. Implement optimistic UI updates for immediate feedback. Handle edge cases like moving a transaction from one category to another (both categories should update). Ensure the budget totals and progress bars recalculate correctly after category changes.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test that changing a transaction category updates both the source and destination category totals. Verify budget summary totals recalculate correctly. Test optimistic updates and error rollback scenarios.

subtasks.details: Create category management page in settings with upper and sub-category lists. Implement upper category renaming functionality. subtasks.title: Transaction Splitting Modal and User Interface

subtasks.title: Parent-Child Transaction Relationships and Data Model

subtasks.title: Rule Priority System with Drag-and-Drop Reordering

Handle edge cases like moving rules to top/bottom positions.

subtasks.title: Rule Matching Engine and Application Logic

Ensure rules don't interfere with manual categorization overrides.

tasks.details:
1. Create monthly view with month navigation (previous/next buttons)
